excerpt: "Red Sift, the leading Digital Resilience Platform enabling organizations to see, solve, and secure vulnerabilities in their attack surface, today announced the Spring 2023 product release. Innovations in this release help customers protect their continuously changing attack surface from bad actors by enabling them to understand how cyber criminals look at their company and assets for vulnerabilities and exposures."
